notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: A.W.-B. performed isolation of essential oils and its components and their identification. M.S. performed the antimicrobial experiments, ≈Å.S., E.K. and A.W.-O. performed the cytotoxicity experiments. All authors analysed the results. A.W.-B. prepared the manuscript. The concept of the work belongs to A.W.-B. All of the authors contributed to the paper and approved the manuscript.
